mapper.select: SELECT id, specialization, status, last_activity as lastActivity, thread_pool_size as threadPoolSize FROM workers WHERE specialization = 'ARTIFACT' AND status = 'ACTIVE' LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO workers (specialization, status, last_activity, thread_pool_size) VALUES ( #{worker.specialization}, #{worker.status, typeHandler=com.witchshop.sharedlib.typehandler.WorkerStatusesTypeHandler}, NOW(), #{worker.threadPoolSize} )
